Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 He smiled. "Im sure youve heard of me. My name is Galvatron. I know you bec 
once Magnus was  a friend of yours and I do contain memories from that 
experience. And the emotions of careing and understanding of you that came 
with. He is running around on this planet somewhere I am sure. But right now 
I wish just to talk to you." he sat down n a rock. "Where have you been all 
this time?"

--part1_f9.e1a6b78.28ab3da0_boundary
